## Lab 2 - Part A: Multiple Models
```{r initial code chunk}
file <- "https://github.com/datalorax/esvis/raw/master/data/benchmarks.rda"
load(url(file))
head(benchmarks)
```

```{r code chunk 2}
library(tidyverse)

benchmarks <- benchmarks %>%
	as_tibble() %>%
	mutate(wave = case_when(season == "Fall" ~ 0,
	                        season == "Winter" ~ 1,
	                        TRUE ~ 2))

```
